title: Login stuck on authenticating
body: Whenever I try and log in, I just get stuck on the constant wheel of authenticating and it does not let me log in. Any way to fix that?

replies.body: Your network is probably getting hung up somewhere trying to talk with our login servers. Let's try adjusting your Port Forwarding and DNS settings to get a bit of a smoother connection first. If you're not sure the best way to change those options, hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps and a few other good troubleshooting steps.
Thank you for the response, I did both and am still getting the same error.

Sorry for the slow reply, you submitted this right as I was starting my weekend! Go ahead and hit the rest of the steps in that guide if you haven't already. If so, reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your network logs so they can get a better idea of what's going on there!
